metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9540 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
tools/tiffcp.c in libtiff 4.0.6 has an out-of-bounds write on tiled images with odd tile width versus image width. Reported as MSVR 35103, aka "cpStripToTile heap-buffer-overflow."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9540` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this will not be fixed in precise/esm

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
